name: Streaming Surge
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Rhodeia of Loch, equip this card.
After Rhodeia of Loch equips this card, immediately use Tide and Torrent once.
When your Rhodeia of Loch, who has this card equipped, uses Tide and Torrent: All of your Summon(s) gain +1 Usage(s).
(You must have Rhodeia of Loch in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
